title: France’s political crisis reveals deep rift between the people and their politicians
description: The likely fall of prime minister François Bayrou exposes a political malaise that is likely to sour French politics well beyond the 2027 presidential election as the far right exploits the moment
content: As the French government faces likely collapse in a confidence vote on Monday, plunging the eurozone’s second biggest economy and key diplomatic power into a domestic political crisis, Jonathan Denis, a 42-year-old a bank manager and health rights ca... [8739 chars]

title: Baby among two killed in Russian drone attack on Kyiv, officials say
description: Several residential buildings are reported partially destroyed and still ablaze in Ukraine's capital.
content:
At least two people have been killed and 11 injured in a new Russian overnight drone attack on Ukraine's capital Kyiv, local officials have said.
One of the victims was a one-year-old baby, whose body was pulled from the rubble, Kyiv's military admin... [330 chars]

title: Newspaper headlines: Rights reform to 'head off Farage' and 'Enders Jamie axed'
description: The fallout from Angela Rayner's resignation and the axing of EastEnders star Jamie Borthwick lead Sunday's papers.
content: The Sunday Telegraph says, external that the new Home Secretary Shabana Mahmood will announce within weeks that migrants in asylum-seeker hotels will be moved into barracks on former military bases. The paper says Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer has ... [1140 chars]

title: Shabana Mahmood set to move asylum seekers from hotels to barracks
description: New home secretary is expected to unveil plans to use military sites as Labour seeks to harden immigration policy
content:
Shabana Mahmood is expected to unveil plans to move asylum seekers from hotels into military barracks as Labour seeks to harden its immigration policy amid rising numbers of crossings in the channel.
